casebody.data:
JOHN McGUIRE, Plaintiff, v. JOHN SINCLAIR et al., Defendants.

Before Monell, Curtis, and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided June 29, 1872. Case and exceptions heard at General Term in first instance. Complaint dismissed at the trial. Edwards & Odell, for plaintiff. Edward Patterson, for defendants.

Exceptions overruled, and judgment ordered dismissing the complaint, with costs.

Opinion by Monell, J., Curtis and Sedgwick, JJ., concurring.
